readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.40/f Elliott 1000/p Gus/t 1500 2200: playful/11 20/farmer 14 24 0 Elliott -30 -30 0 Clint 18 22 2 Marnie 9 22 3 Pam 7 18 1 Lewis 8 22 1 Pierre 4 22 2 Demetrius 3 23 1 Gus 14 18 2 Emily 16 18 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/move farmer -3 0 0/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "嗨 .我馬上就來給您點單。"/faceDirection Gus 2/move Emily 2 0 1/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 800/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 3 true/move Emily 2 0 1/warp Elliott 14 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Elliott -2 0 0/move Elliott 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/speak Elliott "您好， @!真是巧啊！#$b#我剛寫了八個小時的書，想來這裡休息一下。$h"/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "酒保！請來兩杯最好的麥芽酒！^酒保！我要你們最好的麥芽酒。再給這位女士來杯葡萄酒！"/faceDirection Gus 3/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Gus "……$u"/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 2/playSound openBox/pause 400/playSound Milking/move Pam -6 0 0/move Gus 0 1 3/move Gus -5 0 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Gus "給您，先生。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "$q 28376 null#等等。讓我們舉杯慶祝一下！為了……#$r 28376 25 event_toast4#鵜鶘鎮！#$r 28376 50 event_toast2#我們的友誼！#$r 28376 -10 event_toast1#我們的健康！#$r 28376 -50 event_toast3#你的命運！"/faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/showFrame Elliott 16/animate Elliott false false 120 16 17 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 17 16/pause 500/farmerEat 346/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "*打嗝*……勁好大啊……$h"/pause 800/animate Elliott false false 400 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/stopAnimation farmer/end warpOut
content.96/f Gus 1000/f Pam 500/p Gus: jaunty/10 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 10 21 2 Pam -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 200/emote Gus 28/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 24/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 3/speak Gus "哦，哥們，你好。^您好, @。"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/move farmer -3 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Gus "*唉*……正在查看上個月的營收……情況不是很好， @。$s#$b#最麻煩的是……我不想說，因為她是我的朋友……但，都怪潘姆！她已經好幾個星期沒付帳了！$s#$b#……我知道她會辯解，但我不想傷害她的自尊心。$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "@，你得幫幫我！$s"/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Pam 14 24/move Pam 0 -3 3/faceDirection Gus 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Gus 16/speak Pam "嘿！$h#$b#格斯……我快渴死了，給我拿點喝的。"/emote Gus 28/speak Gus "呃……好吧，潘姆。$s"/emote Gus 28/pause 700/emote Pam 8/pause 400/speak Pam "$q 207 null#@，你有什麼事嗎？#$r 207 -50 event_credit1#你現在就得把賒的帳給結了！#$r 208 15 event_credit2#酒吧在經濟上有些困難"/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/emote Pam 12/speak Pam "……$u#$b#*唉*……好吧，我覺得我最好還是把帳給結了。$s"/move Pam -2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 3/move Pam -2 0 2/faceDirection Gus 0/faceDirection farmer 3/playSound money/pause 500/speak Gus "謝謝你，潘姆！$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "還要謝謝你， @。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 0/speak Gus "潘姆，我現在就給你拿喝的。$h"/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "謝謝你的幫助， @。有了這些錢，酒吧就得救了。"
content.97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu: none/4 18/farmer 14 24 0 Clint 4 19 2 Emily 10 11 0 Gus 15 18 1 Shane 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote Clint 28/pause 500/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 150/playSound shiny4/pause 400/playMusic desolate/move Clint 3 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Shane 2 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "您好， @……要不要和我坐一起？"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "讓我跟你講講，我在想些什麼吧。$u#$b#我沒有什麼女人緣， @…*唉*$s#$b#但和我打過交道的人，都知道我是個好人。真的！$u"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Clint "女孩子似乎都很喜歡你， @……^你是個女孩， @……"/speak Clint "$q 211 null#你有什麼秘訣嗎？^你能給我一些建議嗎？#$r 211 25 event_advice1#靠你的能力和魅力打動女性#$r 211 25 event_advice1#做些瘋狂的事情，讓別人猜不透你#$r 211 0 event_advice2#表現得正常一點……做你自己就好#$r 211 25 event_advice1#把女人當男人一樣對待"/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/speak Emily "嗨，克林特，今晚想來點什麼？$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/speak Clint "正確！"/pause 300/speak Clint "呃……我是說，請給我來個大份起司。再多澆一份醬汁。$s#$b#……$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "嗨 @。"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "呃……*清嗓子*謝……謝謝，艾米麗。謝謝你……給我點單。#$b#那個，艾米麗？我……*吞口水*我在想……$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "克林特，怎麼了？$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "…… 算了，沒什麼。$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "嗨，謝恩！這是你的飲料。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "謝謝，艾米麗！$h#$b#那麼……這會兒忙嗎？"/speak Emily "還好！謝謝你的關心，謝恩！$h#$b#你有新的小雞故事嗎？"/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/speak Clint "*唉*$s#$b#我沒救了……$s"/end warpOut
content.911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMes: gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Alex "謝謝你，格斯。這太棒了。"/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/speak Alex "這裡真不錯……我從沒在這裡吃過飯。"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "嗯，總之……我預訂了這個包廂，是為了和你聊聊……$l"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "我端來了@先生的扁麵條配奶油蘑菇醬。^這是女士點的蔬菜湯和胡桃沙拉。#$b#……還有亞歷克斯的烤牛排。^還有這位先生的烤牛排。"/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Alex "謝謝。"/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/speak Alex "那麼，我想說的就是……$9"/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Alex "*咽口水*$s"/pause 600/speak Alex "那個……第一次見到你的時候，我就被你吸引了。我有點不好開口……但我從沒對別人有過這種感覺。$l^第一次見到你的時候，我就覺得你好漂亮。$l#$b#我一直在告訴自己“你不能對別的男孩有這種感覺”。$l^一般情況下，就算我對某人動了心，那種感覺很快也會冷卻……$l"/pause 800/speak Alex "……但我的內心有不同的看法。^……但對你的感覺卻越來越強。$l"/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#我再贊同不過了。#抱歉……我對你沒感覺。"/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "……$l#$b#我不敢相信，對彼此說出這番話，居然要花這麼長時間。$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "嗯……這塊牛排好棒。你能聞到香辣醬的味道嗎？$10"/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
content.rejectJosh: pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "……噢……$s#$b#如……如果讓你不舒服了的話真是抱歉……$s"/pause 2000/speak Alex "我已經不餓了……$s"/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
content.195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message "出於某些原因，你決定把手放到口袋裡..."/pause 500/message "你摸著兔子的腳，感覺如釋重負..."/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "嘿！"/textAboveHead Alex "最近好嗎？"/textAboveHead Shane "哦，你好"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "你來得正是時候，剛好趕上鵜鶘鎮第一屆八球錦標賽！"/pause 500/speak Elliott "別擔心，我以前也沒玩過。$h"/pause 500/speak Shane "很簡單的，你只管猛擊母球就對了…$h"/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和男孩們玩了一局桌球。"/pause 1000/message "毫無懸念，塞巴斯蒂安贏了...不過還是很有趣！"/pause 500/end
content.195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "別跑那麼快！"/textAboveHead Alex "別動！"/textAboveHead Shane "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Sam "呵，從沒想過你所有的“男朋友”會出現在一個房間裡吧，@?$a"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你騙取了我們所有人的愛…你真是太可怕了...$s^@...我還以為你想要和我結婚，共同組建家庭...我到底做錯了什麼？$s"/pause 500/speak Shane "我最後僅存的希望的碎片也徹底被毀了…可真得謝謝你啊，@。你現在高興了嗎？$s"/pause 500/speak Alex "@？我以為...我以為我們是“彼此的唯一”...你卻只是在利用我？$s^你盯著*我*看什麼？你以為我會來救你？$a"/pause 500/speak Elliott "唯獨這次，我竟無言以對...$a"/pause 500/playMusic wedding/speak Sam "我們不會再忍受你的傷害了！$a^現在，我們都知道真相了！我們不會容忍這種事情！$a"/textAboveHead Alex "沒錯！"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯？你還有什麼要為自己辯解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#對不起...我以前做錯了。#各位，冷靜一下！我可以解釋..."/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "當然..."/pause 500/speak Shane "說得好聽，但這事不能就這麼算了...$a"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Sam "...我們已經決定了...對嗎，伙伴們？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "…是的。$s"/speak Elliott "當然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 3/end warpOut
content.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我深表懷疑..."/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#你們所有人都在逼我！讓我說不出“不”！#皮埃爾向我施壓！他想賣出更多花束！#（開始哭）"/pause 100/fork crying/textAboveHead Sam "騙子！"/textAboveHead Alex "對，沒錯！"/speak Elliott "不要把自己的錯誤歸咎在別人身上！你只會繼續失去我們的尊重...$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，男孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "…是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "當然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
content.crying: pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/emote Harvey 12 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/emote Shane 12 true/emote Sam 12 true/emote Elliott 12 true/emote Alex 12 true/speak Harvey "沒用的！這次別想再騙取我們的同情了！$a"/speak Alex "在我看來你只是又演了一場戲...$a^一如既往...$a"/pause 100/speak Sebastian "你需要為自己做過的事負責...$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，男孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "…是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "當然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
content.wewereworried: emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "我是你的丈夫……你應該相信我。我一直對你坦誠地告訴你我的問題。$a#$b#那個……我知道我還沒從強行戒酒癮中緩過來……但是，我在努力做到最好……而且我也健康多了。#$b#我的生活已經比以前好太多了。我已經不在陰暗的地方了……"/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "說起來，我玩這個遊戲的時候，我會專注到沒心思想別的事情。當我有“衝動”的時候這確實很有幫助……"/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "總之……我就……呃……再玩一局就回家。行嗎？"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "你們剛才進來看到我在街機前面的時候，肯定很疑惑吧！$h"
content.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "做得好！"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "進球！"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "走起來！"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "好樣的！"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "嘿，@！你做到了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "所以……你覺得呢？"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "我一直在想……你知道我以前經常夢想有一天成為運動員嗎？#$b#唔，最終結果是跟我想的有些不一樣……$9#$b#不過別誤會了！我還是很開心的！$h#$b#……但是我覺得如果能有一個地方可以讓我們一起在外頭看週日的比賽會很酷。格斯非常喜歡這個主意，他把他房子的裡屋分出來一部分給我了！#$b#這樣，我就可以用簡單的辦法，讓我的“夢想”一直保持。"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你做得很好，兒子。我本來是可以在家裡看的，但來這裡讓我感覺自己又年輕了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "謝謝，爺爺。"/pause 500/speak Kent "我很高興能有個藉口離開家，讓我能夠喘口氣。"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我也一樣"/pause 1200/speak Gus "我很開心。而且它對生意也有好處！$h#$b#雖然可能對謝恩的肝臟不太好……$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "嘿！"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "看來他們有了一個新的星期天常規活動。"/pause 1000/message "5,000 金花得很值！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "再次感謝你的出資，@。對我來說這是一個有趣的項目，並且看起來大伙都很高興！"
content.3206194/n gusGiantOmelet: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 Gus 10 21 2 Willy 13 21 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Robin 9 20 2 Pam 11 20 2 Marnie 9 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 145 193 32 28 10 20.75 8 .15/viewport 11 21 true/pause 3000/speak Gus "唔，伙伴們……我們這次聚在一起又是因為一個很特殊的情況。"/pause 500/speak Gus "……一位好朋友難得到訪……"/pause 500/jump Gus/pause 400/speak Gus "……它就是我舉世聞名的巨型煎蛋卷！$h#$b#爽口的甜椒、多汁的番茄、口感豐富的蘑菇、香濃的起司……全部包裹在香軟的煎蛋裡。來吃吧，伙伴們。"/move Marnie 1 0 0/move Willy -1 0 3/move Lewis 1 0 1/showFrame Lewis 28/playSound coin/showFrame Willy 32/showFrame Robin 37/showFrame Pam 36/pause 600/shake Lewis 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 600/playSound eat/pause 800/shake Robin 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 400/playSound eat/pause 700/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "威利？你覺得如何？"/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "唔……"/pause 700/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/speak Willy "蘑菇比去年的更有嚼勁一點……"/pause 400/speak Gus "你覺得好吃嗎？$s"/pause 400/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 1300/textAboveHead Willy "嗯，小伙子"/pause 300/jump Gus/pause 400/emote Gus 32/pause 1000/speak Pam "很棒啊，格斯。而且因為不收錢，味道更好了！$h"/faceDirection Gus 2/speak Robin "雞蛋口感很棒，顏色也是金黃金黃的……瑪妮，是你家裡的嗎？"/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "不是……你得感謝%farm農場的@！"/emote Lewis 20 true/emote Marnie 20 true/emote Robin 20 true/emote Pam 20 true/emote Willy 20 true/pause 1000/speak Marnie "嗯……%farm的雞蛋。"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "嗯……"/faceDirection Gus 2/viewport move 1 0 7000/pause 500/playSound eat/shake Robin 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Lewis 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Marnie 400/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
